member.name: T:TransitionEffects.LineRevealTransitionEffect
member.summary: This is the implementation of an extensible framework ShaderEffect which loads a shader model 2 pixel shader. Dependecy properties declared in this class are mapped to registers as defined in the *.ps file being loaded below.

member.name: T:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect
member.summary: This is the implementation of an extensible framework ShaderEffect which loads a shader model 2 pixel shader. Dependecy properties declared in this class are mapped to registers as defined in the *.ps file being loaded below.

member.name: F:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.InputProperty
member.summary: Brush-valued properties turn into sampler-property in the shader. Represents the image present in the final state of the transition

member.name: F:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.OldImageProperty
member.summary: Brush-valued properties turn into sampler-property in the shader. Represents the image present in the initial state of the transition

member.name: F:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.ProgressProperty
member.summary: Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for Progress. This enables animation, styling, binding, etc... Double used to represent state of Transition from start to finish

member.name: M:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Updates the shader's variables to the default values.

member.name: P:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets the Input variable within the shader.

member.name: P:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.OldImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the OldImage variable within the shader.

member.name: P:TransitionEffects.TransitionEffect.Progress
member.summary: Gets or sets the Progress variable within the shader.
